title: Can not connect to game
body: When I attempt to start a game the client will often get stuck trying to open the game, usually using alt f4 and reconnecting will eventually solve the problem, however sometimes it simply will not start the game. Is there any way for me to fix this issue?

replies.body: yes it is after champ select, as the client is switching over to the main game.  instead of going to the loading screen where we can see the champs on both teams it will often show just the league of legends logo and not connect past that.

It sounds like this is happening **after** champ select. Do you see any error messages when this happens or any other behavior that sticks out to you? 

Let me know, so I can provide the right steps to take in order to resolve this.
doubt that would help since the laptop works just fine, just not the desktop
Change your ISP or buy a vpn
